description:
Felt`s arcade competition with Reinhard continues, with a little help from an unexpected visitor...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Re: Petit - Re: Petit kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Petit 6 - Buta de Nai Yokubou
